but what exactly is that the essence of
a third safe country agreement is that
migrants have to apply for asylum in the
first safe country that they enter that
would mean that migrants who enter
Mexico on their way to the US would now
have to ask for asylum in Mexico rather
than continue on to the US and ask for
asylum there there's no international

not all countries would agree that

homicides murders there have been over

more than a million migrants have come

the dangers to migrants could increase
the u.s. already has a safe third

numbers have soared people at times

2016 the European Union made a safe

reduced the number of migrants heading
to EU countries we know that the number
of refugees seeking asylum in the EU

that there was a quite a steep cost to
